subject: Update image caching middleware for v2 URIs

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message:
Patch Set 1:

I need to fix tests and add some for the v2 path, but I wanted to get this code up asap. Stand by for test changes.

Patch Set 2:

Good catch, Mark. There's actually a bug in the version negotiation middleware that I need to fix so I can write more explicit (version-specific) patterns for this middleware. Stand by for that review.
Patch Set 2: Work In Progress

Patch Set 2:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/9970/ addresses the problem in the version negotiation middleware that will allow me to make the patterns version-specific here.

Patch Set 2:

I am actually missing quite a bit for this patch. The middleware actually fakes out the entire v1 controller show action, so it needs some extra work for v2.
Uploaded patch set 3.

Brian,

The SmokeStack failures look to be valid:

  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/glance/registry/__init__.py", line 133, in get_image_metadata
    return c.get_image(image_id)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/glance/registry/client.py", line 103, in get_image
    data = json.loads(res.read())['image']
KeyError: 'image'
Uploaded patch set 6.

Should be fixed now. Let's see what SmokeStack says. We also need to get caching on by default in devstack.

Patch Set 6:

I don't know why, but I have this feeling that it would just be better to have /glance/api/v1/middleware and /glance/api/v2/middleware directories and have the V2 middleware just be a totally separate thing, instead of having the if/else switches in a single piece of middleware. Yes, I know that the paste.ini files would need to have the v[1-2] specified in the module loader, but I just think it would be cleaner...

Patch Set 6:

The biggest blocker is the usage of the paste deployment flavor to build our wsgi pipeline. It is used to map to a single pipeline for the glance-api process. There isn't a way to pull that flavor past the version-specific urlmap (composite) in order to load different version-specific pipelines. It would require a lot more time than I have to make it work right now. i originally intended to implement this the way you suggest, but it's a no-go for now.

Patch Set 6: No score

Starting gate jobs.

Patch Set 6: Looks good to me (core reviewer); Approved

Brian, that's an excellent point I didn't think of. Thanks for bringing it up.

Cheers,

-jay
